title: Denial Management Controller
description:
Implement Denial Tracking, Appeals Management, and Analytics Reporting Controller

Create a comprehensive controller to handle denial tracking workflows, appeals processing, and analytics reporting for healthcare claim denials.

Requirements:
- Design and implement controller endpoints for denial tracking operations (create, read, update, delete denial records)
- Build appeals management functionality including submission, status tracking, and resolution workflows
- Implement analytics reporting capabilities with metrics such as denial rates, appeal success rates, common denial reasons, and financial impact
- Define clear data models for denials, appeals, and associated metadata (denial codes, dates, amounts, payer information)
- Add proper authentication and authorization middleware to protect sensitive healthcare data
- Implement input validation and error handling for all endpoints
- Support filtering, sorting, and pagination for denial and appeal listings
- Enable data export functionality for reports (CSV, PDF formats)
- Include audit logging for compliance tracking of all denial and appeal activities
- Write comprehensive unit tests for business logic and integration tests for API endpoints
- Document API endpoints with clear request/response schemas

Edge Cases to Consider:
- Handling duplicate denial submissions
- Managing appeals for denials that span multiple claims
- Processing partial approvals on appeals
- Dealing with expired appeal deadlines
- Managing concurrent updates to denial records

Dependencies:
- Database schema for denials, appeals, and related entities
- Authentication/authorization system
- Reporting/analytics framework or library
- PDF generation library (if applicable)
